Welcome to ``fft_electronic_spin_density``'s documentation!
=================================================================

**fft_electronic_spin_density** is a Python package for performing FFT on Gaussian .cube files of charge or spin density to obtain the (magnetic) form factor for neutron scattering.

See the `project on GitHub <https://github.com/liborsold/fft_electronic_spin_density/tree/master>`_.

Quickstart
================

.. code-block:: python
   
   pip install fft_electronic_spin_density

then 

.. code-block:: python
   
   git clone https://github.com/liborsold/fft_electronic_spin_density.git
   
and execute the ``./examples/fft_examples.ipynb`` Jupyter notebook.
